ingredients.item: 400g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Chunks
28g pack Santa Maria Fajita Seasoning Mix
2 essential Waitrose Peppers, deseeded and sliced
2 essential Waitrose red onions, thickly sliced
essential Waitrose Mature English Cheddar, grated
essential Waitrose Little Gem lettuce, shredded

instructions.step: Place the chicken chunks in a bowl with 1 tsp of oil (reserving the rest) and the seasoning mix. Toss well, then cover with clingfilm and chill in the fridge until ready to cook.
Heat the remaining oil in a wok or large frying pan and stir fry the pepper and onions for 5 minutes, until softened. Tip into a bowl and return the pan to the heat.

Stir fry the chicken gently for 7-8 minutes, until cooked through with no pink meat then return the vegetables to the pan. Cook until sizzling. Stir in the coriander and serve with warmed tortillas, soured cream, Cheddar, lettuce and salsa.
